data.title: Fairy Tail Female’s Measurements Part 1
data.meta_description: by IreneBelserion69, Dec 1, 2018, 12:23:24 AMJournals / Personal ( Final Revision: Added scaling with skull dimensions,Added Volume and Breast Weight) Today at the request  I will be doing "research" into the measurements of the Fairy Tail Females. We would be using these scales as a basis for height measurements of the characters. For this, we would be using the Pixel Scaling…
data.text:
by IreneBelserion69, Dec 1, 2018, 12:23:24 AM

Journals / Personal

( Final Revision: Added scaling with skull dimensions,Added Volume and Breast Weight)

Today at the request I will be doing “research” into the measurements of the Fairy Tail Females.

We would be using these scales as a basis for height measurements of the characters.

For this, we would be using the Pixel Scaling method and the Curfriamnce method to measure the BHW of Fairy Tail.

We’re also going to be using a new scaling method which would be implicated within this revision using the human head scaling to the waifus here as well as other scaling pictures.

One study in the United States estimated the average human head circumference to be 57 centimetres (22 1 ⁄ 2 in) in males and 55 centimetres (21 3 ⁄ 4 in) in females. , we’ll be using this as comparison in bust width, Cup Size, Hip width and ass depth.

We’ll be using these as reference for the images to scale bobs and asses.

And would be trying our best to get the breast volume and breast weight of each female here, using math eqautaitons to get to our desired calc.

Going by this chart, fore about every 0.8-0.9cm with Cup Diameter, we increase the Breast Weight by 1.29 times as well as Breast Volume, if the breasts don’t fall within range of this chart.

Lucy’s Measurements (Pre Skip)

fairytail.fandom.com/wiki/Lucy…

Thankfully the wiki itself gives us a good idea of Lucy’s height for they list her as being Average Height which is roughly 5’4″ or 162cm. She also has a defined BHW of

91cm; waist, 59cm; and hip, 88cm (36 in, 24 in, 35 in).

Lucy’s Bust Frame:442px(29cm)x3.14=91 cm/35 Inches

Lucy’s Underbust:346px (22cm)x3.14=71 cm/28 Inches

And now for Lucy’s bust size.

www.calculator.net/bra-size-ca…

www.realsimple.com/beauty-fash…

measure-bra-size?slide=56307#56307

Subtract your band size from your bust measurement and refer to chart. Example: 37 inches (bust) – 34 inches (band) = 3 inches. That’s a 34C.

Lucy’s cup: 7″ more than Bra Size

Lucy’s Bra Size: 36 G or F Cup

Lucy’s overall Measurments(Pre Skip)

BHW:91,59,88cm (36, 24,35 Inches)

Bra Size: F Cup/ 36 G

www.prokerala.com/health/beaut…

Body Type: Hourglass figure

Each of her boobs would be roughly as wide as your whole head.

And in terms of cup size, you can fit a whole head inside and still have about 1cm more in space within the bra.

As for her ass, that booty is fairy big, nearly twice as large as your head.

Now for volume and Weight

Lucy’s Breasts are within the chart themesleves, 36 has roughly 1,180cc or 2.5US pts wwith a weight of 2.1 kg or 4.6 Lbs

Lucy’s Breast Volume:1,800cc

Lucy’s Breast Mlik Capcity:2.5 US Pts

Lucy’s Breast Weight:2.1 kg(4.6lbs)

In other words her breasts weigh about as much

And can carry as much Milk as two pints of Milk

Lucy’s Measurements (Second Timeskip/Dragon Cry/Outdated)

Now for Lucy and her thickness within Dragon Cry and body did she grow quite a lot from the start of the series.

Lucy’s Height:996px (5’4″/162cm)

Lucy’s Bust:174px183px30cm)x3.14=94cm/37 Inches

Lucy’s Underbust:126px(20 cm)x3.14=64cm/ 25 inches

Lucy’s Wasit:123px((20 cm)x3.14=64cm/ 25 inches

Lucy’s Hips:183px30cm)x3.14=94cm/37 Inches

And now for Lucy’s bust size.

www.calculator.net/bra-size-ca…

www.realsimple.com/beauty-fash…

measure-bra-size?slide=56307#56307

Subtract your band size from your bust measurement and refer to chart. Example: 37 inches (bust) – 34 inches (band) = 3 inches. That’s a 34C.

Lucy’s cup: 13″ more than Bra Size

Lucy’s Bra Size: 38 M or K Cup

Lucy’s overall Measurments(Outdated)

BHW:94,65,94cm (37, 25,37 Inches)

Bra Size: K Cup/ 38 M

www.prokerala.com/health/beaut…

Body Type: Hourglass figure

Lucy’s Measurements (Second Timeskip/Dragon Cry/Updated)

Now for updating Lucy’s body to make sure we get it right.

Lucy’s Height:5’4″/162cm

Lucy’s Height(80% framed):574px(130cm)

Lucy’s Bust:154(35cm)x3.14=110 cm/43 Inches

Lucy’s Underbust:97px(22 cm)x3.14=69cm/ 27 inches

Lucy’s Wasit:93px((21 cm)x3.14=66cm/ 26 inches

Lucy’s Hips:157px(36cm)x3.14=112cm/44 Inches

Lucy’s Cup Size:16” more than bust

Lucy’s Bra Size: 44 P or T Cup in Japan

Lucy’s overall Measurments(Updated

BHW:110,66,112cm (43, 27,44 Inches)

Bra Size: T Cup/ 44 P

HOLY MOTHER OF DICKS Lucy in Dragon Cry is HELLA THICC.

To put her in comparison to other waifus, she’s not only bigger than Rangiku by 1 cm but also drawfs her by one cup size.

Lucy now takes the mantle of Biggest bust of the series , in thrid place below Irene Belserion and Ultear in terms of Breast Width.

And officially surpassing her Ancestor Anna Heartfilla in terms of jugs

And also thrid place in terms of Cup Size, just below Sawn and Irene. Anyways bow to the Opppai Queen of the Fairy Tail Guild.

Lucy’s breasts would be roughly 1.20 times larger than two human skulls put together.

Probably enough to completely smother a Giant man’s skull.

Her cup size compared to the depth of skull is even more frighteningly huge,We’re talking about over two skull lengths with her T Cup boobs..

The assets are even thiccer with her 112 cm ass able to completely smother your skull twice over.

Now for the weight of these massive beasts called breasts.

Going by this chart, fore about every 0.8-0.9cm with Cup Diameter, we increase the Breast Weight by 1.29 times as well as Breast Volume, if the breasts don’t fall within range of this chart. At 16 inches‭ or 40.64cm‬, her breasts are twice the size of anything in this chart.

Let’s appoimeaxte the size via math

LengthxWidthXthiccness

Length of each breast:Bust Width/2

35cm/2=17.5cm

17.5cmx17.5cmx40.64cm

‭12,446‬ cm^3

HOLY DAMN, That’s roughly the capacity of three Milk Gallons for her breasts.

Going by my math with Erza’s Breast weight(Which would soon be updated), the breast weight is around 90% the volume.

12,446 cm^3×90.1%/1,000=11.22kg

Lucy’s Breast Volume(Dragon Cry):12,446 cc or 12,446 ml

Lucy’s Breast Milk Capacity(Dragon Cry): 3.28 Gallons of Mlik

Lucy’s Breast Weight'(Dragon Cry):11.22kg( 24.68 Lbs)

HOT DAMN,To say Lucy isn’t THICC is a understatment.

https://roleplayingblog414201607.wordpress.com/2019/10/20/fairy-tail-measurements-part-3/

Erza’s Measurements (Pre Skip)

Yep time to measure our favorite waifu’s measurements

Erza’s height:953px(5’9″ or 175cm)

Erza’s bust:165px(30cm)x3.14=94cm/37 Inches

Erza’s Underbust:124px(22cm)x3.14=71 Inches/ 28 Inches

Erza’s Waist:112px(20cm)x3.14=62cm/

Erza’s Hips:180px( 33cm)x3.14=103cm/ 41 inches

And let’s run that into the calculator for bra size

www.calculator.net/bra-size-ca…

www.realsimple.com/beauty-fash…

measure-bra-size?slide=56307#56307

Subtract your band size from your bust measurement and refer to chart. Example: 37 inches (bust) – 34 inches (band) = 3 inches. That’s a 34C.

Erza’s cup: 9″ more than Bra Size

Erza’s Bra Size: 38 I or F Cup

BHW:94,71,103 cm (37, 26, 41 Inches)

Bra Size: F Cup/ 38 I

Needles to say Erza is pretty thicc. Then again we all knew that but damn 103cm ass, that’s roughly big enough to smother someone’s entire head with.

In fact her ass is enough to smother two faces easily.

As for her boobs, they’re average by FT standards, they’re only about 37-38 inches but that’s enough for each breast to be the size of your head in width.

Which is consent with many frames of Erza’s boobs matching her head size.

Her cup size is about 1,28 times bigger than a human skull length.

Her breasts are within the charts, at 38 I, her breasts would have a volume of 1,810 cc or 3.8 US pts with the weight of 3.3 kg or 7.3 lbs.

Erza’s Breast Volume(Pre Skip):1,810 cc or 1,810 ml

Erza’s Milk Capacity(Pre Skip):3.8 US pts

Erza’s Breast Weight:3.3 kg(7.3 lbs)

www.prokerala.com/health/beaut…

Body Type: Pear Figure

Erza’s Measurements (Grand Magic Games Arc/Taratus Arc)

Thanks to Frozen Blade for giving me the image and idea to measure Erza who’s noticeably larger than Pr Time skip, but smaller than her Second Time skip counterpart. Now time to measure this thicc waifu.

Height:1079px(175 cmx80%=140cm)

Bust:257px(33cm)x3.14=105cm/41 inches

Underbust:195px(25cm)x3.14=79cm/31 Inches

Waist:183px(23cm)x3.14=74cm/29 inches

Hips:267px(34cm)x3.14=108cm/42 Inches

Erza’s Cup Size:10” more than bust

Erza’s Bra Size: 42 J or L Cup in Japan

Erza’s Measurments(Frist Timeskip)

105,74,108 cm(41,29,42 Inches)

Erza’s Bra Size: 42 J or L Cup in Japan

In other words our favorite waifu got even thiccer, though her waist also got bigger than before.

She did seem to gain some weight if you look side by side between pre skip and Timeskip

So yeah she gained 4 inches at the waist however gained 1 inch more in Cup size and gained 4 inches in bust width and gained over a Inch in Ass mass.

This colbarates with Happy’s statement that she’s gained weight.

Bust wise, she’s slightly bigger than two human skulls in width

Her breasts are bigger than her arms by several times as seen with this frame.

And to put into comparison, her breast cup would be nearly 1.5 times larger than your skull length.

And that ass, oh that ass is just prefect for smothering your face.

So yeah Second Times kip Erza has a smaller bust in terms of Width but much bigger cup size. Now for Breast Volume and mass.

Going by this chart, at 42 J, she’s roughly 2,640 cc or 5.6 US pts which is more than a Half of Gallon of Milk and has the breast weight of roughly 4.8 kg or 11 lbs.

Erza’s Breast Volume(Pre Skip):2,640 cc/ml

Erza’s Breast Milk Capcity:5.6 US pts

Erza’s Breast Weight: 4.8 kg (11 lbs)

HOLY MOTHER OF THICC,This far surpassed what i previously thought, Erza is HELLA THICC.

She’s actually canonically bigger than Tsunade who has a 106 cm breast size.

https://roleplayingblog414201607.wordpress.com/2019/10/24/bleach-girls-measurments-part-1/

And just 2cm smaller than Rangiku whose breast size is roughly 109cm but also shares the same cup size as her.

Ass wise, she matches the ass queen Ultear

Erza Dragon Cry is within the very thicc tier of Waifus.

Her boobs would be roughly enough to completely engulf the heads of two men at once.

Her Boobs are enough to completely overcome twice the length of a human skull.

As for DAT ASS, her ass would completely smother you, now for Breast Volume and Weight.

As you can see, she’s too big to be charted, so onto measuring her via our method.

34cm/2=17

Mirajane Strauss

fairytail.fandom.com/wiki/Mira…

Mirajane is a slim young woman of below average height. She has long, white hair which curls slightly at the ends, with two bangs framing her face and reaching down to her chest; her hairstyle’s most distinctive trait is a short, upward ponytail obtained by gathering and tying the hair covering her forehead. Due to her always adopting such fashion, her hair seems to have adapted to it, with the hair on her forehead remaining pointed upwards even when not tied. She has large blue eyes and a curvy, voluptuous body, with large breasts. Her white Fairy Tail Stamp is located on her left thigh.Mirajane is widely known for her beauty, being Fairy Tail’s drawing card and having posed many times for the Sorcerer Magazine.

So Mirajane’s estimate height is 5’2″ or 157cm given that’s below average female height.

(Revised, Mirajane now has a new picture and new calculations)
